SELECT t1.id AS "id", t1.bed_code AS "bedCode", t1.name AS "bedName", t1.room_code AS "roomCode", t2.name AS "roomName", t1.floor_code AS "floorCode", t1.floor_name AS "floorName", t1.building_code AS "buildingCode", t1.building_name AS "buildingName", t2.room_type AS "roomType", t1.status AS "status" FROM sys_bed_info t1 LEFT JOIN sys_room_info t2 ON t1.building_code = t2.building_code AND t1.floor_code = t2.floor_code AND t1.room_code = t2.room_code AND t2.is_del = 0 WHERE t1.is_del = 0 AND t1.use_flag = '1'
AND ( t1.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWords},'%') OR t1.bed_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWords},'%') )
